theme.label: Menu theme
theme.description: Choose light or dark theme for the extension menus

unblockTimeout.label: Time-out button hold duration
unblockTimeout.description: Number of seconds required when holding the unlock button

scheduleBlocking.label: Allow scheduling
scheduleBlocking.description: Only block sites during certain days and hours

activeDays.label: Active days
activeDays.description: Days on which blocking will be active

activeTimes.label: Active times
activeTimes.description: Times during which blocking will be active

allowRevisits.label: Allow re-visits after unblocking
allowRevisits.description: Allow multiple visits to sites that have been unblocked using the button within a certain time frame

revisitLimit.label: Re-visit time limit
revisitLimit.description: Time frame during which visits to blocked sites will be allowed after unblocking

allowRevisitsDomain.label: Unblock within the same domain
allowRevisitsDomain.description: Allow visiting any website within the same domain when unblocked

blockDomainByDefault.label: Block domains by default
blockDomainByDefault.description: Block every website on the same domain whe adding to block list, unless otherwise specified
